import "../styles/App.scss"; import contactList from "../data/contacts.json"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [data, setData] = useState(contactList); const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const handleSearch = (ev) => { setSearch(ev.target.value); }; const htmlData = data.map((contact) => (

  • {contact.name}

    {contact.phone}

    {contact.email}

    • )); return (
    {/* header */}

    Mi agenda de contactos

    {/* contact list */}
      {htmlData}
    {/* new contact */}

    Añade un nuevo contacto

    ); } export default App;
